attributes.action: DVSA SHOULD NOW OFFER FREE DRIVING TESTS AND COMPENSATE LEARNERS.
attributes.additional_details:
Over the past year the cancellation of driving tests and suspension of driving lessons has caused immense strain financially and emotionally on learners who have been undergoing driving tuition in 2020 - 2021.
Some of these people are of low income or unable to work due to illness.
attributes.background: Compensate people who have wasted time and money on driving lessons to have their tests cancelled and rescheduled in 2020-2021.

rejection.details:
You may like to sign the following petition which we currently have open:

Free driving/theory tests for cancellations and refunds for learners/ADIs/PDIs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/578163
